metadata.Title: CVE-2021-42382 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
A use-after-free in Busybox's awk applet leads to denial of service andpossibly code execution when processing a crafted awk pattern in thegetvar_s function

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-42382` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

busybox - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.4
busybox-initramfs - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.4
busybox-static - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.4
busybox-syslogd - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.4
udhcpc - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.4
udhcpd - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: busybox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.4').
